contest-event.event-date:
June 15, 1905 D Bowness Contest
Bowness Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest
bowness-contest
None
Bowness-on-Windermere, Cumbria, England, UK 1st prize £15, 2nd prize £8 and 3rd prize £4 divided between Barrow Steelworks and Barrow Shipyard, 4th prize £2. March contest 1st Barrow Shipyard, 2nd Dalton Town, 3rd Barrow Steelworks. 5 bands competed.
Feb. 11, 2012, 2:49 p.m. Sept. 6, 2018, 11:26 p.m.
1 Dalton Town Band John Carter Donizetti [arr. Round]
2 Barrow Shipyard Band Francis Lucio Traversi Oberon [arr. Round]
2 Barrow Steelworks Band A. McAlister Tannhäuser [unknown arranger]
4 Egremont Band W. Moore Donizetti [arr. Round]
5 Barrow Wesleyan Unknown Llewellyn
